tool.name: Generate genotype population info

param.name: input_csv
param.label: Affymetrix 96 well plate CSV file

validator.message: 96 well plate data must have 31 columns and 96 rows

param.validator: value is not None and value.metadata.columns==31 and value.metadata.data_lines==96

tool.help:
**What it does**
Generates a file that contains the genotype population information that can be used as input to the multilocus_genotype tool. This tool can be used only within a Galaxy instance which includes the complementaty stag database. -----
**Required options**
